CSS Text Shadows

Published: March 30, 2013

A single shadow:

1
2
3
element { 
	text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); 
}

Multiple shadows on one element:

1
2
3
element { 
	text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), -1px -1px 1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}
